title: Symantec crashes on mysterious investigation
text:
Symantec crashes on mysterious investigation 2:14pm EDT - 01:52
Symantec shares sank by more than a third on Friday after the cyber-security firm said it was investigating concerns raised by a former employee but gave little other detail, spooking investors and Wall Street analysts. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Symantec shares sank by more than a third on Friday after the cyber-security firm said it was investigating concerns raised by a former employee but gave little other detail, spooking investors and Wall Street analysts.
